property.name: Text
property.value: Reduce the cost of supports you deploy by 1 (min 1). If a support card you control has more damage on it than its cost, sacrifice it. Forced Interrupt: When a unit you control takes damage equal or lower than its remaining HP, move 1 of that damage to a support card you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reduce the cost of support you deploy by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control no support cards this unit gains 1 command icon. Interrupt: When this unit leaves play, Rally 6 a support card, add it to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: The effects of this event cannot be cancelled. Action: Exhaust an enemy target support card and Rally 8 a support card, add it to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to your warlord. Attached unit gets +1 HP. Combat Action: Exhaust this attachment to remove 1 damage from up to 2 support cards you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot be targeted by card abilities. For the purpose of card effects, this card is considered to have a cost of 4. Reaction: After a support card you control leaves play, draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot be targeted by card abilities. For the purpose of card effects, this card is considered to have a cost of 4. Reaction: After a support card enters play, treats its textbox as blank until the end of the round and remove 1 damage from a support card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each enemy unit at this planet loses the Area Effect keyword. Forced Interrupt: When an unit you control at this planet is chosen as a defender, declare another eligible unit as the defender instead, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you deploy this unit, the next time your opponent deploys a unit this phase, he must deploy it at this planet, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When this unit leaves play from a planet, your opponent must choose, at the same planet, either to exhaust a unit he controls or ready a unit you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit is destroyed, your opponent must choose to either put 2 card from his hand on top of his deck or you draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After this unit enters play, your opponent may exhaust a unit at a planet to move this unit to that planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deploy Action: Search your deck for 2 cards with a different name. Reveal them, have your opponent chooses one, add it to your hand, and shuffle the remaining card in your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Harlequin unit you control. Interrupt: When damage is assigned to a Harlequin unit you control at this planet, exhaust this attachment to reassign 1 of that damage to another non-warlord unit at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After the deploy phase begins, sacrifice this support to have each player exchange their command dial value the next time they reveal their command dial this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a Vostroya unit moves to a planet, place 1 F on it. Then you may sacrifice this support to place 1 F on that unit and Rally 6 a support, add it to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: No Wargear attachments. Reaction: After a combat turn during which this unit was an attacker ends, take a combat turn. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you attach a non-Drone attachment to a unit at this planet, draw a card. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: This unit gets +1 ATK for each remaining HP. Reaction: After an attack against this unit resolves, exhaust this unit to deal 2 damage to the attacker. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit is turned face-up, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Brutal. While any warlord is bloodied, this unit gains 1 command icon. Reaction: After this unit enters play, move up to 2 damage from Chaos army units and Khorne units to this unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: While any warlord is bloodied, this unit gets +1 ATK and +1 HP. Action: Deal 3 damage to an army unit at this planet. Play this ability only if your opponent won a command struggle at this planet this round. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a unit is assigned damage at this planet or an adjacent planet, sacrifice this unit to prevent 2 of that damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit resolves its attack, deal 1 unpreventable damage to a unit at this planet. If that unit is destroyed by this effect, Rally 6 an attachment card, attach it to this unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this unit is at an infested planet, it gets +1 HP. Reaction: After you deploy this unit, exhaust a target enemy support.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you infest a planet, draw a card and infest an adjacent planet. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: No Wargear attachments. Forced Reaction: After you deploy this unit, have your opponent draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: You cannot include [Chaos] Elite units. Reaction: After this unit commits to a planet, a non-Elite army unit you control at an adjacent planet is considered to be a warlord while checking for a battle at that planet this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a battle begins at this planet, switch the printed ATK values of two army units at this planet until the end of a combat round.

property.name: Text
property.value: This event cannot be cancelled. Action: Deploy 2 non-Elite units with a different name from your discard pile at 2 different planets. Reduce their cost by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to your warlord. Attached unit gets +1 HP. Combat Action: Exhaust this attachment to give a non-Elite army unit you control at each adjacent planet +1 ATK and +1 HP until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After your opponent wins a battle, exhaust this support to have your opponent sacrifice an army unit at that planet, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: The effects of Ritual events you play cannot be cancelled. When the first round starts, remove each Ritual card in your deck from the game. You may play Ritual events you removed from the game as if they were in your hand. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: You may play Ritual events you removed from the game as if they were in your hand. (Limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you play a Ritual event, sacrifice a unit at this planet to have up to 4 units you control at this planet get +1 ATK until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After your warlord commits to a planet with an enemy warlord, choose up to 1 enemy unit at each planet without a Warlord. Deal 2 damage to each chosen unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Command Action: Rally 12 up to two units with cost 4 or lower, put them into play at a target planet and shuffle your deck. If those units are still in play at the end of the round, return them to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When a player places a planet in their victory display, sacrifice an army unit at a planet with no enemy army unit to remove that planet from the game instead. At the end of the next round, place the planet in that player's victory display and draw 4 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an army unit enters play or moves to a planet with a unique unit you control, exhaust it and move up to 2 damage from units at the same planet to that unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to your warlord. Attached unit gains 3 command icons. Combat Action: Sacrifice this attachment to switch the damage on your warlord with the damage on a hale warlord at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deploy Action: Exhaust this support and target a non first-planet to draw 1 card and gain 1 R. If your opponent wins a command struggle at the targeted planet this round, they draw 1 card and gain 1 R.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit leaves play, place it at the bottom of your deck to Rally 6 a Tank, Vehicle or Krieg unit with a different name, put it into play at the same planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Vehicle army unit. Attached unit gets +1 HP. Action: Exhaust this attachment and remove 1 damage from attached unit to retreat it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a planet. Limit 1 per planet. Each unit with a printed cost 3 or higher at this planet gets -1 ATK. Reaction: After a battle ends at this planet, draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a Harlequin unit enters your discard pile from a planet, return it to your hand to deploy a Harlequin unit with a different name at the same planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After the deploy phase begins, draw 1 card. Then your opponent may choose 2 units he controls (or his warlord if he controls no other unit) to draw 1 card. You may deal 1 damage to one of the chosen units.

property.name: Text
property.value: This unit gets +1 ATK and +1 HP for each Cultist unit you control at this planet. Reaction: After a Cultist unit you control leaves play from this planet, deal 1 damage to a unit at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After your warlord commits to a planet, until the end of the phase, each army unit gains an amount of command icons equal to their ATK value.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cost of units you deploy is increased by 1. This unit cannot change control more than once per round. Action: Give control of this unit to your opponent.

property.name: Text
property.value: This unit gets +1 HP per attachment on it. Interrupt: When an attachmement leaves play from this planet, return it to your hand instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Destroy a target token unit at this planet or an adjacent planet. Then this unit gets +1 ATK and +1 HP until the end of the phase. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When a unit you control is routed or moves from a planet, move this unit to that planet. (Limit once per phase.) Forced Reaction: After this unit resolves its attack, move it to your HQ.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit enters play, attach an eligible attachment from your discard pile to this unit and exhaust a target enemy limited support card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After the combat phase begins, your opponent moves this unit to an adjacent planet. Then you may deal 1 damage to this unit to deal 1 damage to a non-unique unit at that planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit enters play, put 1 Termagant token into play at this planet and each adjacent infested planet. Interrupt: When your opponent triggers an ability that discards a card from your hand, put this unit into play at a planet to draw two cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit enters play, put a Brood unit into play from your discard pile at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot retreat. Interrupt: When this unit leaves the first planet, move it to an adjacent planet to remove all damage from it and give it +1 ATK and +1 HP until the end of the game instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a N unit enters your discard pile from play, exhaust this support and place 2 units from your discard pile at the bottom of your deck to Rally 6 a N unit with a printed cost of 3 or lower, put it into play at a target planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: To deploy a unit at this planet, your opponent must reveal two units he can deploy from his hand. Choose one, its cost is increased by 2. Then your opponent decides which of those units to deploy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When your Warlord would be defeated, move it to a target planet to remove all the damage from it instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a unit you control moves to this planet, this unit gets +1 ATK and +1 HP until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When a unit you control is destroyed, move your Warlord to the same planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to your warlord. Attached unit gets +1 HP. Combat Reaction: After your Warlord moves to a planet, exhaust this attachment to move an army unit you control at that planet to an adjacent planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each army unit you control at a planet with your Warlord gets +1 HP.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an enemy unit enters play, put a card from your hand attached facedown to that unit. Then draw a card. (Limit once per round.) As an interrupt when the attached unit leaves play, you may deploy the facedown card at the same planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bloodied. Interrupt: When this unit is defeated, discard it and put a Termagant token into play at a target planet, this token is considered a warlord. If it is defeated you lose the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot be deployed from your hand. Each other unit you control at this planet cannot be damaged by Area Effect. This unit must be declared as a defender, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Reveal a facedown card you control attached to a unit. If it's a unit, deploy it at this planet and deal 1 unpreventable damage to attached unit (Max 1 per round).

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an army unit you control. Interrupt: When attached unit leaves play, exhaust a target enemy army unit at this planet and return this card to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your warlord's ability can trigger twice per round instead of once. Combat Action: Exhaust this support to deal 1 damage to a unit with a facedown attached card.

property.name: Text
property.value: While at a planet with a unit with faith you control, this unit gets +1 ATK. Reaction: After you play a shield on this unit, place 1 faith on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an attachment card is discarded, Deep Strike this unit to deploy that attachment from your discard pile attached to this unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Saim-Hann unit. Limit 1 per unit. Attached unit gets +2 HP. Reaction: After attached unit is assigned damage, exhaust it and this attachment to prevent all of that damage. Then attached unit gets +1 ATK for its next attack this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an attack resolved by this unit against an army unit doesn't destroy it, put 3 Termagant tokens into play at this planet. If the planet is infested, put 4 tokens instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: While at an infested planet this unit gets +2 HP. Reaction: After this unit destroys an enemy unit, put X Termagant tokens into play at this planet. X is printed HP value of that enemy unit. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: If all effects of this event are cancelled, draw 2 cards. Action: Exhaust a target army unit. Then, you may sacrifice a unit to rout it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an army unit. Attached unit gets +1 HP. Interrupt: When a unit is assigned damage by an attack at this planet, reassign 1 of that damage to another unit controlled by the same player at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an army unit. Attached unit gets +1 ATK and +1 HP. Reaction: After this unit enters or leaves play, deal 1 damage to a target unit at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may deploy this card as Wargear attachment with the text: Attach to an army unit. Attached unit gets +2 ATK and +1 HP. Interrupt: When attached unit leaves play, detach this card to have it become an army unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: If all effects of the event are cancelled, gain 2 resources. Exhaust an army unit. Then you may sacrifice an attachment to exhaust another target army unit at the same planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an army unit. Attached unit gets +1 ATK and +1 HP. Action: Exhaust this attachment to rally X an attachment, add it to your hand. X equals the number of attachments you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may play this card from your card collection as if it were in your hand (Max 1 per trigger). Reaction: After another player plays a card named Bonesinger Choir, Squiggoth Brute, Corrupted Teleportarium, Gun Drones, Archon's Palace, or Land Speeder Vengeance, gain 2 resources and draw 2 cards.
